alert.note: Alert for Delta; Fannin; Lamar (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 11:38PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Delta, western Lamar and northern Fannin Counties through 1215 AM CDT... At 1138 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Crockett Lake, or 19 miles northeast of Bonham, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Paris, Honey Grove, Roxton, Dodd City, Lake Bonham, Sumner, Lake Gibbons, Crockett Lake, Arthur City, Coffee Mill Lake, Camp Maxey, Pat Mayse Lake, Lake Crook, Powderly, Forest Hill, Boyd, Windom, Toco, Telephone and Duplex. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for north central Texas.
